import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../Context/AuthContext'; function Nav() { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); const { user, logout, isBranchManager } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; return (

( // Customer Navigation <> Dashboard Products Services Branches ) : ( // Default Navigation for unauthenticated users <> Home Products Services About Contact )}

); } export default Nav;
